name: Mubaloo
tagline: Making People's lives better through Digital
description:
Mubaloo is the UK’s leading, award-winning digital consultancy and development agency specialised in mobile and app development. We believe in making user’s lives better through technology and delivering successful outcomes to our clients. We solve problems by creating digital products that support business strategies, enable users and deliver on their promise.
 
Mubaloo is part of the Reprise Network the digital performance arm of IPG Mediabrands. Being part of the Reprise Network allow us to offer our clients full end-to-end product launch capabilities, from audience discovery to go-to-market strategy including above and below the line campaign execution.
 
Over the past ten years, Mubaloo has created over 300 apps and digital products with leading organisations worldwide. 
 
Mubaloo has been recognised by Clutch at Top UK App Developer for 6 years in a row (2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019).
